name: Speech Racer
description:
You can play the game on your browser ! ;) Click here : https://lab.menica.me/racer

---

You should never have trusted this person. This land is not really known for being inhabited by honest peoples.

The ship was really cheap but now, nothing responds to your orders and you have not even left the city. You triggered the city defenses by your drunk driving style and the ship is out of control !

Even the coffee maker is out of service ; you pray you won't have to use the toilet. Everythings seems lost ... until you found the last functional thing : your old keyboard ! Your last chance is to type your orders to your ship with this thing.

Just hope it will work !...

A game by Tieffeline and Menica Folden
